original_text: Then I said, I will not make mention of him, nor speak any more in his name. But his word was in mine heart as a burning fire shut up in my bones, and I was weary with forbearing, and I could not stay.
korean_text: 내가 다시는 여호와를 선포하지 아니하며 그의 이름으로 말하지 아니하리라 하면 나의 마음이 불붙는 것 같아서 골수에 사무치니 답답하여 견딜 수 없나이다

sentences.original_text: I will not make mention of him
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그를 더 이상 기억하지 않으리라

sentences.original_text: nor speak any more in his name
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 이름으로 더 이상 말하지 않으리라

sentences.original_text: But his word was in mine heart
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 말씀이 내 마음에 있었으니

sentences.original_text: as a burning fire shut up in my bones
and I was weary with forbearing
